title: Slope-Intercept Form
text: Write each equation in slope-intercept form. Since there is no $$x$$ term we write $$0x$$:\n$$y=0x-4$$, $$y=0x+3$$

title: Slope
text: Since $$m=0$$ for both equation, the lines have the same slope.
speech: Since  m is equal to 0,  for both equation, the lines have the same slope.
pacedSpeech: for both equation, the lines have the same slope.

title: Parallel Lines
text: The lines have the same slope and different y-intercepts and so they are parallel.
speech: The lines have the same slope and different y-intercepts and so they are parallel.
